TopicTitle: Another country and rival space program on Kerbin with different parts but NO WEAPONS

Articles.Content:
My suggestion is to have another country on Kerbin (for example on the Korean-peninsula-like continent east across the ocean from KSC), that also has a space center there on the shore, and a rival space program.

The two space programs would have different approaches to space exploration and different vehicle parts to use. In a nutshell, KSC would concentrate more on spaceplanes, solar panels, manned exploration, big, powerful rockets, and more and more cockpit-like flying experience for kerbonauts, while the other space program would be focused on reusable rockets, developing better autonomous robotic spacecraft with advanced A.I., advanced RTGs for power generation, smaller rockets, and more nuclear engines and parts for travel in vacuum.

If you land a Kerbal on enemy territory, he will be taken hostage, and you would have to bribe him out by offering money, research, space samples or technology to the rival space program.

But there would be no weapons, no war and stuff just a semi-peaceful space race.
